title: "KI-FLEX AI chip tapes out with flexible videantis processor platform"
excerpt: "FlexAISIC AI chip based on its flexible v-MP6000UDX unified processing platform. The tape-out has been achieved in collaboration with the Fraunhofer Institute for Integrated Circuits IIS, and the chip development is funded by the German Federal Ministry of Education and Research (BMBF) within the KI-FLEX project."
